@PublicAPI(stability=VOLATILE, mayInstantiate=false, mayExtend=false, mayInvoke=true)

Package org.opends.server.admin.std.server

Provides server-side interfaces for accessing the Core directory server administrative components.

See: Description

Package org.opends.server.admin.std.server Description

Provides server-side interfaces for accessing the Core directory server administrative components. Components within the server can use the interfaces defined within this package to query the properties of the managed objects and register to be notified when managed objects are added, removed, or modified.
